评论详情: These leggings are so stinking soft! I love them. I’ve had them for years, and bought another pair not too long ago, the quality is the same which I love. My older pairs have developed holes but they are used a lot. These are comfy sweats/joggers, not great for exercise if you’re tryna keep cool. They loosen up a bunch after some washes. I like that they’re long. I’m 5’8” and they actually go down to my ankles! I got them as a Christmas gift, best Christmas pajamas ever!

I ordered 2 different designs of these pants. The green ones are crazy soft and comfy!! The ones with a pattern are not as soft but they are still very comfy. The fit is fantastic too!! I'm a 2x and kinda short and these pants are pretty long in a 2x but they can be scrunched down and not look terrible. I like them a lot and will probably order more in the future if they end up being pretty durable.

After a little less than a year of about once a week use, the thighs ripped since I have thick thighs. They are my favorite pants to wear since they are comfortable and soft. (I consistently wear them to sleep because they are so comfy!) Cat hair sticks to it very well, but it gets out in the wash. The pockets are too small as my phone and other items constantly fall out. There is pilling if you have thighs that rub together. Overall, despite all of the issues, I do love these pants. I just bought three more since they have a great price. They fit well, I am an XL being 5'3" and 220lbs.  Warning, The Charcoal Grey color turns out to be a bit like a navy blue, but the black is black!
True to size, cute colors, great for being comfy, good fabric, worth the money!

评论概述: For relaxed fit buy 1 size up unless you have pencil legs
评论详情: Excellent. Very comfy. Plenty long enough. Likely wont shrink. You know the kind of leggings that are super soft with the sort of “moleskin” feel? That’s what these are made of. These are loose fit super soft leggings with the cut of a woman’s jogging pant. Originally I bought the I’m 5’10.5” & 225lbs. I have a proportionate build. I’m in between (stretch) jeans sizes 16-18 right now. Originally I bought these in XL. It fit like slightly loose leggings. I returned them for the XXL and they’re perfect. If you’re close to being the next size then go with that bigger one.

评论概述: CAREFUL OF SOLIDS IN STRAIGHT-LEG STYLE (if you're not tiny) THEY'RE AMAZING! (not athleisure wear!)
评论详情: I found this brand RANDOMLY, because someone was selling these pj pants on a resale site.  They looked comfy so I was happy to find them on Amazon for a great price. (I hate spending a ton of money on pj's that I'm only going to wear at home, unless they're "special sexy pjs" you know?)I liked the standard straight-leg ones, but I LOVE leopard and they didn't have my size in leopard, so I grabbed the jogger style, never tried joggers before but I took a chance, who cares, they're returnable and I'm wearing them inside my home! I got the leopard joggers and the straight-leg pants in grey camo and burgundy.  I tried on the camo as soon as they came and I was IN LOVE.  They are SO soft and comfortable.. I don't wake up hot in the night, so they're SO soft, almost feel like a SUPER THIN fleece (but I don't want you to misunderstand, they are NOT what we would usually describe a fleece pj pant.) They're DEF Pj pants, not athleisure wear or anything, THESE ARE FOR AT HOME PEOPLE!! lol. Thrilled with my purchase!!.... so far.....A few days later I tried the joggers on, LOVE! It's a different style for me and a little less "fleece-y" feeling but easy to wear for anyone considering trying joggers!  I waited a while (assuming I was keeping all these and maybe even buying MORE,) but then I put the burgundy pair on one evening, (same style as the grey camo I bought, if you recall...) They were the same thing, comfy, same material, but OMG THEY WERE HORRIBLY UNFLATTERING!! SO SO UNFLATTERING THAT I WOULD NOT WEAR THEM IN MY HOUSE IN FRONT OF MY FAMILY.  It was AWFUL.  I don't want to offend anyone, but they really just made things look a lot worse on me! I was so sad, but I recently had a similar experience with leggings, the printed ones looked great but the solids showed every single imperfection.  I realized the SOLID COLOR (burgundy vs the grey camo print,) probably because its such a thin soft material, SHOWED EVERY SINGLE LUMP, BUMP, SKIN IMPERFECTION, WHATEVER ...ETC! If you are an xs-s, or you're very very toned and fit, or have no cellulite or dimples or skin imperfections-- you may be completely fine with a solid color! But for many of us that might not be the case, and the prints are 100% a great choice if you fit into that category!  (Don't get me wrong, It's not the company's fault I have recently gained weight or that I am not slimmer or more toned.. it's mine! I just want to encourage others to select the best color for them so they are happy with their purchase too and feel comfortable, not discouraged or bad about themselves because of some silly pj pants!!)---> SO A STRONG RECOMMENDATION TO OTHERS BEFORE SELECTING COLORS TO PURCHASE: if you have ANY skin issues you don't want shown, or (ACTUALLY) ACCENTUATED, (think like--back of your thighs? on your bum? cellulite, anything like that..) I WOULD 100% ORDER THE PRINTS!  THEY HAVE A TON OF OPTIONS FOR THE PRINTS AND THEY'RE SUPER CUTE (I found it so hard to choose initially!) SO YOU'RE NOT MISSING OUT BY NOT GETTING THE SOLID COLORS! The grey camo isn't unflattering on me AT ALL! I love them! They honestly look great!  The joggers are excellent too! The joggers are actually a lot looser on me than the straight legged pants so I'm not sure if the solid joggers would be as much of an issue but I'm not going to take the chance.  I bought XL, could have got away with L, but I wanted a really loose fit for sleeping and comfort, (and even still the burgundy showed everything, so they weren't just too tight on me..) I returned the burgundy and am going to grab another print because I love them so much. Might grab a few to go with my nieces and nephews x-mas presents.  After washing they seem to hold up fine!  It's rare sweatpants or pj pants are long enough on me, not sure why because I'm only 5'6" but for some reason casual sweat and pj pants  (HELLO OLD NAVY?! WHAT THE HECK?) seem to be SO short, which I hate! These ARE NOT SHORT! They're nice and long. I dried them in the dryer too and they didn't shrink up on me in the length.  Just NOTE: before they go in the dryer, TIE A KNOT ON THE DRAW STRING ON EACH END OF THE STRING WHILE THE STRING IS IN THE PANTS OR DOUBLE KNOT THEM VERY VERY TIGHTLY!  Once they went through the dryer I was searching for the string to pull back through the waist of the pants, I put a knot on each end (like comes standard on many sweats and no more issues with that.All in all they're a great price and a great pant, I think they're my new go to pj pants! Cheaper and better hold-up quality than the pj pants in most of the big box stores...just buy the prints if you're concerned about being self conscious especially with the straight legged style... I promise you'll thank me!!! ;).Sorry for the long review but I hope this gives potential customers as much information as possible to purchase pants you'll be able to enjoy!!!

评论概述: Super soft, long, and cozy leggings!
评论详情: These are my new favorite PJ pants! They cover my ankles for those cold mornings and are super soft but not too thick for sleeping. Love the prints!
They are great for yoga in the winter dodging from your car to class or under clothes as an extra layer. Fit great and very comfortable. Love that they have pockets.

I LOVE THE WAY THEY LOOK AND FEEL.I ACCIDENTLY BO- UGHT 2 PAIRS OF THE SAME PATTERN BUT I'M GOING TO KEEP THEM.I HAVE LONG LEGS AND THEY ARE THE PERFECT LENGTH I'M THICK AROUND THE WAIST SO TH- EY ARE A LITTLE TIGHT,BUT I DID ORDER SOME DIET PI- LLS, LOL.I HAVE ON THE ONES THAT ARE BLACK,PINK ,GREY AND WHITE .I CAN'T GET OVER HOW SOFT THEY ARE.I PLAN ON ORDERING THE ANIMAL PRINT ONES NEXT.I ALSO PURCHASED THE BLACK ONES WITH THE PINK BUTTERFLIES ON IT. YOU CAN'T BEAT THE PRICE. I PLAN ON WEARING THEM ALL WITH JUST SWEATSHIR- TS AT HOME BUT I HAVE SOME NICER CASUAL TOPS TO WEAR WHEN I GO SOME PLACE.THEY AREN'T LINED, AND THEY DO STRETCH,BUT THEY ARE THIN,BUT THAT'S FINE FOR LIVING IN THE SAN FRANCISCO BAY AREA .

These are soft and a great length. this is my second pair, the first one gifted by my sister.  They are soft, and thicker than a lot of joggers, which is great for this cool weather. I’m not normally a camo person, but I do love these in gray camo. One thing I particularly like about these is that the length is longer than a lot of joggers (which just hit my ankle with no room to spare). These have plenty of length.  I am 5’6 1/2” and 200 lbs, and I ordered the 1X, the fit is perfect!  The only reason I took one star off is because the left pocket is not sewn together on the inside, so there’s a 4” gap, so I am unable to use that pocket. I’ll have to remember to put my phone in the right pocket. I’m already wearing them, and I love them so much. I’m not taking them off to return them. So I will deal with the unfinished pocket.

I first bought a sharp color Kelly Green, it is beautiful and very comfortable but looser/larger than I expected. With the great price, I decided to keep it and ordered 4 additional color/patterns (Wine, cherish rose, charcoal rose, mystique rose) and size down to M. I appreciate they offer so many different colors using the lovely feather light weight fabric at great price.

I bought several pairs for a UK cruise last summer.  They were great for the moderate to warm weather, they didn't wrinkle after packing, they wash/dry well, they're true to size, msoft, stretchy and have pockets.  I love them!  I'm doing 2 weeks in Ireland this summer and plan to take them again, plus a couple new colors!

类型: Color: Triple Shades of GraySize: Large
评论详情: I love these pants and have ordered several colors. The last color i got was the "triple shades of grey". While it is still pretty and I like it the picture I think is a little misleading. I would call this shades of bluish grey with the emphasis on blue. I would still recommend this color though and every color i have ordered. These are very comfortable and i think good quality.

I am 5'7 and 120-125 pounds.  I got a medium.  The length was a tad short, but it works.  I use them to hang around the house in.  Sort of look like pjs.  I wouldn't work out in them, not the right type of pants for that.

I may or may not be obsessed with these. They are incredibly soft and comfortable and I’m officially going to need them in multiple colors. They’re on the clingy side so you’re safe to size up if you want a looser fit.

Unbelievably soft. Fit great. So comfy. But they are thin!! I wasn’t looking for warm, so I’m happy about that - but just be aware. To me, solid colors are less flattering than the prints - but that’s for my body type.

I like feel of the material. My only complaint is they run small. I gave the first pair I ordered to a friend and ordered a larger size than I normally wear. Other than them running small in size, I love them! They are also very comfortable!
They are so soft and comfortable, runs a little bit big but I wanted them loose. These are a long length, but I’m short at 5’4” so I just bunched them up at the ankle.

评论概述: Run Large, But so soft and comfy!
评论详情: I am 5'2" and ordered an XXL and I am going to reorder an XL as they run large and are very long. Also, the washing instructions say to line dry but I tossed them in the washer and dryer and they came out fine. Definitely very soft amd comfy so I am going to try a smaller size.

They weren’t the material I expected them to be, they don’t seem like pants you can wear outside the house. So I expected to return them. But as soon as I tried them on, they were so soft and comfortable, I didn’t care. I am keeping them as in-the-house pants. They’re just too pajama-like to wear outside. But I live in these inside the house now. I never want to take them off.

I like the color and material of these joggers pants. They are comfortable, easy on and off. I ordered an EL which is perfect without making me look fat. The price is good as they are casual wear for me.
I didn't like the material at all. I have muscular thighs so they weren't relaxed much in that area. I'm looking for more of a cotton blend next time around.  Legs are quite long.
I love these joggers.  Super soft and comfy.  I actually bought a few more pairs for the gym.  Fabric is soft and no problems after several washings.

I ordered these because my daughter ordered them and loved the fit and material they are made of.,I ordered a small and I am 5ft 6in and weight around 127 lbs. I think they fit great also and I love the material. They are very comfortable
I’ve purchased 3 pairs of these joggers and are my go to pants when I’m out running errands. They are comfortable and are not tight like leggings are. They have a high waist and wash well.

I bought one pair of these and promptly purchased 3 more in different colors! They are so soft, so comfortable, great pockets. I bought some for my daughters and they bought more pairs for themselves. We’re all obsessed!

I'm really not huge on writing reviews unless simmering was really amazing or amazing awful.  These fall into the category I want a pair in every color! The texture is buttery soft, fit is spot on and beyond comfortable!  Lol Another pair is arriving tomorrow! 👍👍

This is the 4th pair of these pants I have purchased.  I love them! They are soft and very comfortable.  They can be worn around the house or out shopping.  They have been washed several times and still look new.
To wear
Love this pant, so much I ordered several different colors. So comfortable . I wear for long walks or dress up with a nice top.
Very comfortable pants. Love the waist band and the ankle . I haven’t washed any of them yet but I’m sure if I follow laundering directions they’ll be fine

these joggers are really soft and comfortable I ordered a large which is my size and I am pleased with them  they are not lined and probably would not be good for outdoor wear but inside is a go. I really like them
I often have issues with the sizing of clothes, but this one fits perfectly. The given measurements were spot on. The fabric has a nice cozy feel and the pink color is exactly as pictured.
These are thin, but super soft! The fact that they are thin is perfect for my hotflashes! Highly recommend! Don't even think twice about purchasing these!

The pants are very soft. Cute style. They are longer than expected and I have decently long legs. These things are very high waisted! All the way up to my chest! I'm 5'9".  I wear a 10/12 pants. My legs are thin'ish but I'm curvy. I was going to order a med. but read reviews and decided on a large. Glad I did. The fit on the legs is not too baggy and the waist is just right. Hope that helps!
I love these leggings! I have two pairs now! They fit to size, are well made, wash well and are very soft! I would definitely recommend!
For once my plus size pants fits perfectly. The color is the right shade. I am pleased with my purchase.

I bought this for my mom as a birthday gift and she loves them, she wears them all the time. They fit perfectly snug but at the same time a bit loose, for reference my mom is 5'2 and it perfectly fit her, not too long and is around 135 lbs.
I ordered a black and dark blue pair of joggers. Fit is perfect and very comfortable. Also added just enough warmth to ward off that winter chill.  A good purchase!!!
Very well made and colors were very vibrant. I am 5ft 1in and weigh 128 and the large fit nicely. The length is nice for a petite size person. Someone over 5ft 5in might consider them short.

For the price point of $13 and some of the reviews, I wasn't expecting high quality. They are a thin material which I wanted for the gym as mine runs hot. The color is not what I wanted, darker than the picture but I'll keep them out of poor laziness plus they are really comfortable for lounging. They are a slim fit jogger so size up and appropriately. They are high waisted but, by all means necessary, you don't need to pull them all the way up.

I have always had multiple wiener dogs so when I saw these, I had to try them. They are the softest pajama pants I’ve ever worn in my life. I bought a back up pair to put away for later, and I have sent these as Christmas gifts to my friends who also have wiener dogs. They are nice and long. I’m 5‘11“ and these fit me absolutely great. If you’re short, you might be swimming in them. There are so many options and colors, I love these!

Super soft and comfy.  It was suggested I get small but I want them to be roomy, not tight like traditional leggings, so I went with medium.  They're a little long, I maybe should have tried for petite length (I'm 5'3")

These leggings are so soft and very comfortable. They fit like regular athletic pants would with a little extra room and give on the straight part of the pants. I ordered a small and they were a bit large on me. I would size down, but I would definitely buy again!
I thought they would be thicker but they are comfortable.
Perfect fit - true to size. not loo tight, not too loose. tho a bit too long! Lightweight, which is great - my legs get hot. Will be ordering more colors
These joggers are so comfortable and soft. I recommend buying a pair and I plan to order more!
Bought these to wear to Disney World.  Practically perfect in every way
These leggings are a perfect fit, very soft and warm and very comfortable. I would buy again.
Reviews said they run small, they don’t. Very comfortable and roomy, from a good manufacturer at that! Well made, fit slightly baggy
Love them wear them at home for every day wear. The size was perfect . The color was just what I wanted
Soft material, high waisted, and good stretch. Great leggings for the cost!

评论概述: So soft and comfy!! Runs small
评论详情: I bought 2 pair of these. I have recently lost weight, and needed some comfy casual pants to wear to work with a company tee. A friend bought these and recommended them. After looking at the size chart, I decided to size up to a 2X to be on the cautious side. I would not have been able to wear the XL, which is what the size chart recommended. I'm a size 16 currently and most leggings and athletic pants I wear a XL but these would have fit like leggings. They are super comfortable, and if you work in a casual environment you can totally get away with them for work. I wear mine a couple days a week with a company logo tee.

评论概述: Very nice quality, wellmade roomy comfortable.
评论详情: These pants are great. Very nice fabric, medium weight, well constructed. Roomy, but fitted in the right places, and the red is true red! Love them. Good pockets, allow full range of movement.

I am 250lbs, pear shaped body with a very low hanging apron stomach. I was skeptical because a lot of pants do not sit right on me at all. These are different. First off- they are not thick, and very smooth/soft and comfortable. Maybe not perfect for winter but definitely for fall weather. Secondly- they are a bit long. I am 5'4" and I was afraid they would be too long. Thank God for the tapered off ankle it kinda keeps them in place where I am not stepping on them or tripping. Thirdly- the only issue I have is the elastic band around my stomach. A little bit uncomfortable. Tight to my comfort. But other than that Perfect for traveling, perfect for taking long walks, perfect for mild weather. I will definitely buy a few more pairs. Pockets are a little small and not deep enough.

Overall these are nice casual pants. They are very soft, and wash well so far. I needed a pair of bright green pants for spirit wear purposes, and these were one of the best options I could find.  Note that if waist size is a main concern for you, these pants have a fairly stretchy waist. So if you are on the edge between sizes due to waist size concerns, you may want to consider trying the smaller size. I kind of wish I had done that, because other than the waist the rest of the pants are a bit over-large on me. But overall I am happy with the pants for my purposes.
These joggers are flattering, comfortable and exactly what I was hoping for. I plan on purchasing them in more colors.
These leggings are so comfortable. The print is very pretty. I like the fact that the leggings are not  stretchy but loose fitting leggings.
This is my second pair. They are absolutely the best.
Very comfortable, great fit as well as a great price.

I searched for something cozy to wear for Christmas Eve. I decided on these and I am very pleased they were exactly what I was looking for the fit is perfect and the material is soft. Looking forward to a cozy evening in my new PJS. Highly recommended!
These are so soft and comfortable.  Wear them as leggings or lounge pants. I've gotten a lot of compliments on these.
These pants fit great!! I do not have long legs so most things are usually too long. These fit super! They’re cute and I was surprised at how soft they were!

I ordered these back in 2020-so almost 5 years ago, and I love these. They’re lighter pants- good for lounging around.  I’m short and I love that there’s the cuff on the bottom of the foot so the material can’t drag across the floor. Super comfty and I’ve had a baby since then and I was able to wear these pants pre-baby, postpartum, and still now. Came back to this product looking to hopefully purchase another pair lol. My one gripe is that the pattern didn’t match the photo but it was close enough so I was still happy.

I bought several pair of these last year because I love everything about them.  This year I bought 3 more pair and I I agree with the other reviewers, They are not quite the same.  They are a lot tighter in the waist and a tad shorter, enough to be annoying.  I fist purchased 3 pair from another retailer that were a few $ cheaper but the quality just didn't compare so I returned them and ordered these. I am keeping them but I am a bit disappointed in the changes. Please don't slack on your quality.  That is what is so wonderful about this brand.
Fits perfectly. Good quality. Not too thin, not too thin.  Would buy again.
After I bought them, my granddaughter and friend liked them & also got them.

I ordered XXL probably should’ve gone CL. The waist band goes up under my chest. Pockets are very shallow if you have an iPhone plus it’ll keep falling out. Soft fabric and nice quality though lightweight
I just had a hip replacement surgery and these pants are so comfortable. Soft comfy they are attractive looking and fit well.
Have several pairs: comfortable and launders well

Love these leggings
We love these!
They are super soft and comfortable. I will buy another pair in black!

I am very happy with these pants.  Fabric is very comfortable and they laundered well.  Very happy with this purchase.

I own lots of leggings from leggings depot. like 10 pairs probably. I have jacked up knees and they're some of the few pants that don't stretch too tight over my knee, and also let me sit however I want. Just now got my first pair of these joggers and I LOVE THEM. same super soft material (maybe softer) but with a drapey fit and POCKETS. I got the 1X, I usually wear an XXL/16 and these fit great. I might try a 2X as well just to see if they're good loose or bad loose, lol. The waistband is a teeny bit tight, but I think it'll loosen over time. The waist is very high, and these are quite long also, so keep that in mind (I have long legs and always buy tall and these are fully ankle length on me with a bit extra).
Fit

I don't think I've ever felt softer material in my 65 years on earth. Deep pockets, drawstring waist. If you are looking for warmth these aren't them. If you're looking for lightweight and comfort you found it. We'll worth the price, true to size. Highly recommend and will be ordering a pair in every color.

评论概述: A Must Have In Your Wardrobe
评论详情: I am going to write they type of review that I look for when I am buying clothes on the internet. First and foremost, I am 5'2" 175 lbs. I have a short torso. I have been looking for some new joggers as it is getting colder but I hate thick clothing because I run hot. I also hate anything that is tight on my body. I bought these in an XL and they fit amazingly. Just the right length, and they are loose enough that I do not feel self-conscious in them. They are soft and not too thick. The best part was the price. $16.00!! I will be ordering some more in the next few days.
Nice light,breathable material and vivid red color. Very comfy.
Love the vivid colors and soft feel of these pants. True to size.

评论概述: Soft, warm and comfortable, without being bulky!
评论详情: I absolutely love the color and softness of these joggers.  They seem to be well made and of a comfortable weight opaque fabric.  The opaque fabric keeps them from being seen through.  Several things I’m not as pleased with are the high waist.  I’m not a fan of high waists and as with others, I had to fold the waist over to keep the crotch from hitting near my knees.  These are cut very long, but the cuffed legs keep them from dragging.  Lastly, the pockets are pathetically small.  It’s a feat of stretching and pulling to get one’s phone into a pocket and even then, it is not a secure fit.  I have three more unopened pairs of these legging in other colors and I’m debating whether to return them.  Besides the above stated reasons for the lower grade is that I can’t wear them without a baggy top which hangs over the waist, since they’re rolled over.
Nice soft fabric, comfortable and attractive.  This is the second pair purchased and will purchase more.
You won't regret buying these. They are so comfy! I love mine!
Soft, comfy, fit to size. Great joggers!
Love these! So comfortable and fit perfect . Will be buying more.
I have bought TEN PAIRS OF THESE THINGS. They fit nice, they’re soft, I love the variety of colors, they’re not too warm/fleecey, I AM HAVING A BALL!

I haven't worn them yet, but so far, I like them a lot. They are so soft and comfortable and they fit nicely. Since I'm short (@5'2"), there is a bit of fabric flopping over the cuff, but that's part of the design. I had been wearing Danskin Now Relaxed Fit cotton drawstring pants for many years and loved them. They are no longer available and these will be a good (and more fashionable) substitute.  Update: I wore them recently on two 4.5 hour flights. They were comfortable and cozy. Back home the temperature dropped 30 degrees and now I'm wearing them like long underwear, under my jeans. They keep me warm and keep out the wind. Great find!

评论概述: Comfortable and with pockets! You can wear with heels or tennis shoes!
评论详情: Love these! You can wear all day everyday! Dress them up or dress down!

I bought the style with zippers because I have similar pants from a different manufacturer and my phone always falls out of my pocket. The zippers on these do stop my things from falling out, but zippers are tough to open and close, and they often catch on the fabric. I hope the zipping smooths out after more use. Also, the stitching keeping the zipper in has come loose after the first wear. For the price, I’m still happy with these joggers so far, but will try them without zippers next time.
Super soft. Love the zipper pockets. I have long legs and these are long enough. Light weight but not chintzy. Very comfortable. A little too high waisted for my liking but no other complaints.

The colors tend to be off 2/3 times I bought them but not too far off (for example, the grey is more of a medium-dark grey than a light grey, and the purple-blue is more of a navy blue, not as purple and vibrant as the picture)

So I got these cuz I ordered some from temu and while I liked the style and feel I couldn't quite get the size right... And I thought Amazon had the same great price a return and a return is easier. So I ordered these and they feel amazing they are so soft it feels like ur naked the fit is great I order a little bigger in women's b/c i find they always fit tighter and I prefer a slightly looser fit.
